name: Mobile Dimension LLC
description:
Mobile Dimension are the proven experts in enterprise mobile solutions and technologies. Our key services include developing mobile applications, building end-to-end corporate mobile infrastructure, developing unique b2b and b2c solutions, technical support, consulting and supplying mobile devices with pre-installed corporate software.
Our client portfolio includes the Russian and international corporations as well as small and medium businesses. Mobile Dimension joins the authoritative CNews rating of the “Top mobile app developers for business and government in 2016”
